title: VeStation Urban Organic Kitchen
description: Modern Thai food restaurant with an all vegan food menu that includes raw salads, Thai salads, a variety of noodle, vegetable, and curry dishes. Offers a bargain weekday lunch menu. Uses fresh veggies and some healthy ingredients like buckwheat noodle and quinoa. Located inside Sherman Oaks Town Center Shopping Center strip mall by the Healthy Discount shop. Has parking lot.
